text:
🐢Punggol Point Park's unique feature is the beautiful Turtle Pond with amazing sunbathing turtles.
⛱️The Park also features a Sand-filled Playground for younger kids to sandplay.
🍔🚻🌄🎣Close by are the Punggol Point Jetty, an Observation Deck, Punggol Beach, The Punggol Settlement eateries and a most important public toilet.

Experience outdoors with biking, beach walking, sightseeing, fishing,  and turtle watching. These and other activities you can enjoy in Punggol Point Park.
Had a blast, and the weather was lovely. Had an amazing day there. Will visit again.
This park has a seaside path, perfect for jogging, walking, or cycling. It also has a turtle pond, a beach, and a seaside area. It’s a nice little park to relax and enjoy.

Best of both world for my kid who loves 🐢 & sand play
Limited parking but there are many BTO flats in the area to turn to
Nice environment, new HDB, a new town far from city area, if you like quite place, this is a good place
